articles.title: Teen admits sexual offences including molesting 15-year-old girl after drinking game - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A 17-year-old boy committed sexual offences against two 15-year-old girls he met on Snapchat and Instagram, molesting the first girl after she grew tipsy from a drinking game.

articles.title: Asian shares rally as investors await U.S. jobs data - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares snapped two days of losses on Friday, climbing as investors waited to see whether U.S. jobs data due later in the day would reinforce the need for faster U.S. interest rate hikes.
articles.content: HONG KONG, Jan 7 (Reuters) - Asian shares snapped two days of losses on Friday, climbing as investors waited to see whether U.S. jobs data due later in the day would reinforce the need for faster U.S… [+3207 chars]

articles.title: First Mover Asia: Bitcoin Stabilizes Near $43K as Layer 1 Tokens Attract Attention - CoinDesk
articles.description: ONE, FTM, ATOM and NEAR quickly turned green despite Wednesday’s broader market sell-off.

articles.title: Russia sends paratroopers to Kazakhstan to put down uprising - RNZ
articles.description: Russia has sent paratroopers into Kazakhstan to quell deadly unrest in the central Asian country, says a military alliance of former Soviet states.
articles.content:
